Learning to read Welsh, one Tweet at a time...

Follow @tweetsinwelsh

02
Jul 2020

Wedi bod yn dysgu Cymraeg i'r byd ers 6 mlynedd bellach!
Ar hyn o bryd, dw i'n dysgu pobl fendigedig yn UDA, Sweden, Sbaen, Ffrainc, Lloegr a Chymru....@BywBod #yagym pic.twitter.com/3EDCrPImLJ

— Gwefus (@GwefusCymru) June 28, 2020

bellach - now

ar hyn o bryd - at the moment

bendigedig - wonderful

Have been teaching Welsh to the world for 6 years now! At the moment, I teach wonderful people in the USA, Sweden, Spain, France, England and Wales

01
Jul 2020

Rydyn ni eisiau gwybod mwy am argaeledd gwasanaethau iechyd meddwl ar gyfer pobl ifanc yn yr iaith Gymraeg. Dysgwch mwy > https://t.co/7DjOh6n3pX pic.twitter.com/Zavu5ut74b

— Mind Cymru (@MindCymru) July 1, 2020

iaith - language

argaeledd - availability

iechyd meddwl - mental health

We want to know more about the availability of mental health services for young people in the Welsh language. Learn more> http://surveymonkey.co.uk/r/RVKHVNK

30
Jun 2020

Dyn ni’n chwilio am bobl i ymuno â’r tîm sy’n cynnal y cŵrs. Os oes diddordeb neu eisiau gwybod mwy plîs anfona neges uniongyrchol ata i.

— Welsh on Duolingo (@Welsh_Duolingo) June 30, 2020

uniongyrchol - direct

..ata i - ..to me

anfon - send

We are looking for people to join the team running the course. If you are interested or want to know more please send me a direct message.

29
Jun 2020

Helpwch ni i weld pa effaith y mae'r cyfnod hwn wedi ei gael arnoch chi rieni a'ch plant.
Cliciwch ar y ddolen isod i lenwi'r holiadur.
Diolch
​https://t.co/ZdCFMmhFvw

— Rhieni dros Addysg Gymraeg (@RhAG1) June 25, 2020

effaith - effect

isod - below

llenwi - fill

Help us to see what impact this period has had on you parents and your children. Click on the link below to complete the questionnaire. Thankyou.

28
Jun 2020

Os ydych yn gwylio Lung Water o’ch ffôn symudol heno, ewch fan hyn i lawrlwytho’r app @ambobdim ymlaen llaw - mae’r sioe yn dechrau am 7yh! https://t.co/ZyFQYWi5tk

— NationalTheatreWales (@NTWtweets) June 27, 2020

ffôn symudol - mobile phone

lawrlwytho - download

ewch fan hyn - go/head here

If you’re watching Lung Water from your mobile tonight, head here to download the @ambobdim app in advance - Show starts at 7pm! http://amam.cymru/ambobdim

Jun 2020

Eisiau gwybod beth sy'n digwydd yr wythnos nesaf? Dyma'r cipolwg cyntaf ar raglen #steddfodAmGen o 29 Mehefin ymlaen pic.twitter.com/TT95kFD2YX

— eisteddfod (@eisteddfod) June 26, 2020

digwydd - happen

cipolwg - look/glimpse/glance

rhaglen - programme

Do you want to know what's happening next week? Here is the first glimpse of the '#steddfodAmGen' program from 29th June onwards.
